entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
